snippet.title: Phantom of the Grove - Game Jam Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out Phantom of the Grove on Steam! 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/3510510

For #PirateJam16, the theme was "You Are The Weapon". We created Phantom of the Grove, a game about protecting the sacred Aya Trees from relentless waves of invaders by possessing them, turning them against each other, and leaving them to face the consequences.

We're building it into a full game!

- 😘 Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/3510510
- 🌲 Play the jam version! https://survansix.itch.io/phantom-of-the-grove
- 💌 Join our mailing list for latest updates! https://survansix.com
